attributes.action: A referendum for Perth and North Perthshire
attributes.additional_details: I believe that Perth and North Perthshire should be allowed to decide who they want to run Perth and North Perthshire Holyrood or Westminster
attributes.background: Have a referendum on deciding if Perth and North Perthshire wants Holyrood or Westminster in charge of running Perth and North Perthshire

rejection.details:
A number of attempts have been made to start petitions making requests similar to this petition, using what appear to be fake names and email addresses.

We can only consider a petition if the creator has started it using their full, legal name, so if you would like to proceed with your petition please can you contact us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk so we can verify your identity.
